thread.title: Khloe Kardashian shares mirror selfie of taut midriff | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian shares mirror selfie of taut midriff | Daily Mail Online

author: Sameer Suri For Dailymail.Com
title: Khloe Kardashian shares mirror selfie of taut midriff | Daily Mail Online
text: comments As she helps people attain 'revenge bodies' on E!, Khloe Kardashian's reminded fans of the work she's put into her own. She posted a mirror selfie to Instagram on Friday in which she showcased her impressively toned midriff in a pulled-up sweater. The 32-year-old captioned: 'The best project you'll ever work on is YOURSELF! Project KoKo is an everyday thing. Mind, body, soul'. 'Project KoKo is an everyday thing': Khloe Kardashian posted a mirror selfie to Instagram on Friday in which she showcased her impressively toned midriff in a pulled-up sweater She'd tugged at the waistband of her skintight black and white leggings to give an even fuller view of her sculpted midsection. Large yellow shoes complemented some of the patterning on her top from PE Nation, and the flash from her phone as she took the selfie obscured her face. The ex-Mrs. Lamar Odom was standing in what appeared to be a garage, a treadmill and a gleaming black car visible in the background. Sultry snap: Khloe's hair stylist Jen Atkins shared this sexy snap of the star flaunting serious side boob Feline filter: On Friday, her Snapchat Story played host to multiple dispatches from her workout session, often taken as selfies Advice: She gave her following a workout 'tip,' revealing that 'I try to drink three or four liters of waters a day' That morning, her Snapchat Story played host to multiple dispatches from her workout session, often taken as selfies. In a series of videos, her filter gave her a cat's ears and whiskers, as well as a high, nasal voice. She appeared to be on the treadmill as she spoke. 'Good morning!' she said. 'I am about to work out with my sisters. I'm just waiting for them, but I want to give you guys a really good, basic tip.' Facilitated: Another set of videos saw her and her two elder sisters, Kourtney and Kim Kardashian, working out together as a male trainer stood in the background Eldest: The 37-year-old firstborn of Kris Jenner gamboled about for the camera, with cat ears and cat whiskers - as well as a cat snout - of her own Quoth she: 'This is such a silly tip, but it works. I try to drink three or four liters of waters a day, and it wins every- ' she said, holding up a bottle of SmartWater. 'And it's three or four minimum, normally,' she explained. 'Water flushes you out. It keeps you young, skin good, hair good, everything good.' As she said, 'It doesn't hurt to try it. It's only water. It's not gonna kill you. I say, try it for about a week or so and see how you feel. I bet you're gonna like it.' Animated company: As they went through various types of exercise, set of course to music, Khloe's filter added a kaleidoscope of yellow cartoon butterflies Another set of videos saw her and her two elder sisters, Kourtney and Kim Kardashian, working out together as a male trainer stood in the background. The 37-year-old firstborn of Kris Jenner gamboled about for the camera, with cat ears and cat whiskers - as well as a cat snout - of her own. As they went through various types of exercise, set of course to music, Khloe's filter added a kaleidoscope of yellow cartoon butterflies. New work: The 32-year-old currently stars on the E! show Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian, on each episode of which she helps two contestants grapple with their emotional baggage and remake their figures On each episode of her new fitness-themed reality show, she helps two contestants grapple with their emotional baggage and remake their figures. During Thursday's episode, she opened up about her marriage to Odom while talking to a contender called Tiffany whose husband had separated from her. 'I wanted to be with Lamar and I would do anything,' she said, noting: 'I never missed one home basketball game. That was who I was, but I took pride in that.' Relating: During Thursday's episode, she opened up about her marriage to Lamar Odom while talking to a contender called Tiffany whose husband had separated from her Kardashian had married Odom in 2009 and filed for divorce in 2013, but only managed to put the finishing legal touches on their split last October. Late in 2015, he'd overdosed on multiple drugs at a Crystal, Nevada brothel, winding up comatose and on life support in a Las Vegas hospital. Though they were separated, he and his wife were still legally married, and she'd jetted to his side, helping oversee the medical arrangements. Background: Kardashian had married Odom in 2009 and filed for divorce in 2013, but only managed to put the finishing legal touches on their split last October On Thursday's episode of Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian, she recalled that 'I never wanted my divorce, but I needed to get one because somebody else wasn't fully involved in the marriage, and that's not a way to live.' Of her wedding ring, can pinpoint 'one day where I was just, ''I don't want to wear it anymore.''' She reminisced that 'I was going to a concert and my little sisters were with me and I just felt the comfort of being with them.' Yet and still, ' I remember holding my hand the whole time and kind of covering it. You do - it's very emotional.' Tough decision: On Thursday's episode of Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian, she recalled that 'I never wanted my divorce, but I needed to get one because somebody else wasn't fully involved in the marriage, and that's not a way to live' Share or comment on this article 139
